about_the_game:
See the game!
Digital Artbook will help you discover the process of creation: from world, towns, forests, to all types of Yokai enemies, characters, and many more!
64 pages of concept art, models, ideas. How our game was created? How our animated Intro was created - it's all there!
detailed_description:
See the game!
Digital Artbook will help you discover the process of creation: from world, towns, forests, to all types of Yokai enemies, characters, and many more!
64 pages of concept art, models, ideas. How our game was created? How our animated Intro was created - it's all there!
